body:
@quentinmit 
I am sending 500,000 requests with a concurrency of 10,000 goroutines that will getting an EOF on HEAD/POST requests because of a Golang bug :https://github.com/golang/go/issues/15723, I don't know how to fix this because this bug will fix on 1.8:https://github.com/golang/go/issues/15723. so I am try to  create a new http.Client for each post request.
